title: Live: UK Parliament in lockdown after 'shooting'
text:
Ooops.. At least one check box should be ticked. FILTER UPDATES Text and Social Videos 08:48 PM (IST) There are also reports of further violent incidents in the   but it would be wrong of me to go into further details before confirmation from the police.   House of Commons 08:47 PM (IST) Assailant who stabbed policeman shot: Reuters 
An assailant who stabbed a policeman inside the perimeter of Britain's parliament was shot by police, David Lidington, the leader of   told parliament. 08:38 PM (IST) British police say incident on Westminster bridge being treated as a firearms incident: Reuters 08:38 PM (IST)   says sees at least a dozen   bridge near Parliament 08:37 PM (IST) Bangs similar to gunfire heard outside Britain's parliament, two people treated: Reuters 
Loud bangs similar to gunfire were heard outside Britain's parliament on Wednesday and two people were seen being treated inside the gates by medical staff. 08:35 PM (IST) London police said they were called to a firearms   near the British parliament on Wednesday: Reuters From around the web More from The Times of India Recommended By Colombia
